Module roborally
Package client.view

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
client.view.Controller
client.view.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updatable
public class GameController
extends Controller
implements Updatable
The GameViewController class controls the GameView and coordinates its inner views.
Author:
Simon, Sarah, Amulya, annika

    The label displays which round it currently is.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void addGameBoard()
    This method constructs the gameBoard, initializes the gameBoardController and adds it to gameView.
    private void addOtherPlayer()
    This method constructs the otherPlayer view , initializes the othersController and adds it to gameView.
    private void addPlayerMat()
    This method constructs the playerMat, initializes the playerMatController and adds it to gameView.
    void attachChatPane​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane chat)
    This method sets the chat in the chatPane with its width and height.
    void changePhaseView​(GameState phase)
    This method changes the phases and reset elements related to the state of phases.
    private void constructPhaseViews()
    This method constructs the different phase views and their controllers.
    private void fillDamageCardsList()
    This method fills the damageCards list with all available damage CardTypes.
    PlayerMatController getPlayerMatController()
    This method returns the playerMatController.
    void initialize()
    This method loads and adds the gameBoard, the playerMat and initializes the otherController view, it also constructs the views of the different phases.
    void keyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
    This method handles what should happen if the player presses the keys W, D, S, A, M, P.
    void removePlayer​(Player player)
    This method removes a player by exiting from the othersController and its small playerMat and also it removes the player from the gameBoard.
    void resetFocus()
    This method sets the focus to the boardPane
    private void resetIfNotFirst()
    This method calls all controllers that need a reset if it's not the first round.
    private void resetInProgrammingPhase()
    This method resets everything at the start of a programming phase. it sets the nodes visible or invisible and updates the current round in the label, resets the deck counter and adds all the player to the activePlayers list.
    private void setDisplayAction​(java.util.ArrayList<JSONBody> currentAction)
    This method checks the currentAction of the player, it then gets added to the moveInfo label, which is only visible if the current card of the player is a damage card.
    void update​(JSONMessage message)
    This method checks which JSONMessage the gameController got and handles it.

    Methods inherited from class client.view.Controller

    displayingTime, extractCardType, generateImageView, getProgrammingImageView, getRegisterPosition, getWasFormerRegister, setProgrammingImageView, setRegisterPosition, setWasFormerRegister

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This method loads and adds the gameBoard, the playerMat and initializes the otherController view, it also constructs the views of the different phases.

    • addGameBoard

      private void addGameBoard()
      This method constructs the gameBoard, initializes the gameBoardController and adds it to gameView.

    • addPlayerMat

      private void addPlayerMat()
      This method constructs the playerMat, initializes the playerMatController and adds it to gameView.

    • addOtherPlayer

      private void addOtherPlayer()
      This method constructs the otherPlayer view , initializes the othersController and adds it to gameView.

    • fillDamageCardsList

      private void fillDamageCardsList()
      This method fills the damageCards list with all available damage CardTypes.

    • attachChatPane

      public void attachChatPane​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane chat)
      This method sets the chat in the chatPane with its width and height.
      Parameters:
      chat - the chatPane

    • resetIfNotFirst

      private void resetIfNotFirst()
      This method calls all controllers that need a reset if it's not the first round.

    • resetInProgrammingPhase

      private void resetInProgrammingPhase()
      This method resets everything at the start of a programming phase. it sets the nodes visible or invisible and updates the current round in the label, resets the deck counter and adds all the player to the activePlayers list.

    • changePhaseView

      public void changePhaseView​(GameState phase)
      This method changes the phases and reset elements related to the state of phases.
      Parameters:
      phase - which should be next

    • constructPhaseViews

      private void constructPhaseViews()
      This method constructs the different phase views and their controllers.

    • setDisplayAction

      private void setDisplayAction​(java.util.ArrayList<JSONBody> currentAction)
      This method checks the currentAction of the player, it then gets added to the moveInfo label, which is only visible if the current card of the player is a damage card.
      Parameters:
      currentAction - a list with all actions since the player is the current player

    • update

      public void update​(JSONMessage message)
      This method checks which JSONMessage the gameController got and handles it.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Updatable
      Parameters:
      message - which the server sent which is related to the game

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      This method handles what should happen if the player presses the keys W, D, S, A, M, P. Each of those hotkeys has impacts.

      W, A, S, D for manipulating the orientation of the robot

      M, P for manipulating the music

      Parameters:
      event - which key gets pressed

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(Player player)
      This method removes a player by exiting from the othersController and its small playerMat and also it removes the player from the gameBoard.
      Parameters:
      player - which should get removed

    • resetFocus

      public void resetFocus()
      This method sets the focus to the boardPane

    • getPlayerMatController

      public PlayerMatController getPlayerMatController()
      This method returns the playerMatController.
      Returns:
      the playerMatController
